Name: EB013  - AR credit memo email to the customer if app rejected
Output_template:
{"subject":"{process_name} form not approved","fromName":"{approver}","from":"{approverEmail}","recipients_to":"{emailAddress}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"5cc978e9c7f1c","body":"

<div style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">
<div>Dear {fullName},</div>

<div></div>

<p>Your {process_name} form, reference {case_ref} was not approved.</p>

<p>Reason {reason}.</p>

<div></div>

<p>Yours sincerely,</p>

<p>Portsmouth City Council</p>
</div>
 

","attachments":""}
